text: The Luce Memorial Chapel () is a Christian chapel on the campus of Tunghai University in Taichung, Taiwan. It was designed by architects I. M. Pei. The Luce Memorial Chapel was established through a donation by Henry Robinson Luce, and was named after his father. == References == Category:Churches Category:I. M. Pei buildings Category:1963 establishments in Asia Category:20th-century establishments in Taiwan
title: Luce Memorial Chapel
